resources.string: App opens automatically as soon as an eMeal card is discovered.
If there is a WiFi connection, the map of Dresden gets downloaded to the device when you start the map.
Some apps (Threema, FB Messenger...) just share the image without text if this option is activated.

A big thank you to the just mentioned developers, who published their source code as free software and thus supported the development of mensaDD.

Furthermore many thanks to Paul for his support during implementation and to the Perry Rhodan Youth for testing during development.

And last but not least I'd like to give a big thanks to all the people who use this app and their useful feedback! ;-)

The NFC balance check uses source code from Jakob Wenzel and Farebot. The graph visualization of the balance history has been realized with hellocharts. The map view uses the Mapbox Android SDK.\n\nThe source code of mensaDD is available onGitHub, licensed under GPL.

I am not liable for any inaccuracies in the meal data.
The meal information gets downloaded from the website of the Studentenwerk Dresden and parsed by an external server.

If you have any wishes or suggestions, just write me an E-Mail!
Due to a missing internet connection the image could not be loaded.
Due to technical reasons the meals could not be loaded/updated.
The balance data is only stored on your device. If you uninstall the application all data is gone. In order to manually reset all data, go to settings.
Deletes all locally stored meals, priorities of clicked canteens and balance data.

The design has been completly updated. The main view now consists of a list of all canteens. The canteens you mostly choose automatically appear at the top of the list. The main menu can be shown by swiping from the right display edge.
As an alternativ to the list view you are now able to see all canteens on a map which is accessible via the main menu.

When sharing meals you are now able to attach pictures (see settings). The menus will be accessed server-sided from the the student services page. This saves time and computational cost on your device.
To check your eMeal card\'s credit simply put the card on your phone with NFC activated. Your settings will allow you to open mensaDD automatically as soon as the card is recognized.
When you check your balance, you can save the value by pressing the save button. Later you can take a look at the history of your balance checks. This is accessible through the main menu.
to the new version of mensaDD! There are many new things you can discover. Have fun with all those changes and enjoy your meal(s)! ;)
Green background for vegan and vegetarian meals
